resources.string: Optional short description about the workout
Show time info in workout matrix
Amount of different grips in a Set
In Repeaters, how many times to hang a single grip (reps)
In Repeaters, the small off (rest) time between hangs (reps)
Amount of times the whole set is repeated

Scaled Bars scales four important workout variables (Intensity, Average Difficulty, Workload, Power) between 0-1. Zero being the minimum value found in workouts and one being the maximum. With this information we can observe how increasing one variable affects the others. For example increasing Intensity usually decreases Difficulty. However it is possible to steadily increase every variable over time if progression is achieved.
